titleStmt.title: The charitable pestmaster, or, The cure of the plague conteining a few short and necessary instructions how to preserve the body from infection of the plagve as also to cure those that are infected : together with a little treatise concerning the cure of the small pox : published for the benefit of the poore of this city and not unmeet for the rich / by Thomas Shervvood ...
titleStmt.author: Sherwood, Thomas, Practitioner in physick.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for John Francklin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
